text.text: How can I activate Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) in ZOLL Online?

text:
To activate Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) in ZOLL Online, you will need to:
1. Log onto ZOLL Online and go to Admin > Billing > User Accounts.
2. Go to the Administration roles & permissions banner and check the box next to Edit API credentials and View API credentials.
3. Scroll down and find the NEMSIS import roles & permissions banner. Change the product access from no to yes.
4. Click Save.
5. Click Enable to turn on MFA.

text.text: What additional security measure does MFA provide in ZOLL Online?

text: MFA provides an extra layer of security in the form of a two-step authentication: a password and a one-time use code.

text.text: Who has the authority to enable MFA in ZOLL Online?

text: Only a Company Administrator can activate MFA in ZOLL Online.

text.text: What should I do before enabling MFA for my company in ZOLL Online?

text: Before enabling MFA for your company in ZOLL Online, you should communicate the change to your users.

text.text: How can I communicate the MFA changes to users in ZOLL Online?

text:
To communicate the MFA changes to users in ZOLL Online, you can send them an email or post a message on your company's intranet. In the email or message, you should include the following information:

* The reason for enabling MFA
* The steps that users need to take to enable MFA
* The date that MFA will be enabled

You can also provide users with a link to the Zoll Online help center, where they can find more information about MFA.

text.text: Where can I find the option to enable MFA as a Company Administrator in ZOLL Online?

text: As a Company Administrator in ZOLL Online, you can find the option to enable MFA by going to Admin > Billing > User Accounts and clicking your user name.

text.text: What steps do I follow to enable MFA for my company ?

text:
To enable MFA for your company, follow these steps:

1. Go to Admin > Billing > User Accounts.
2. Click your user name.
3. Click the Enable Multi-Factor Authentication button.
4. Read the important information in the next window.
5. Click the Enable Multi-Factor Authentication button.

text.text: What happens if MFA fails to enable for some users

text: If MFA fails to enable for some users, you will see their ZOLL Online user account email address.

text.text: How can I disable MFA once it's enabled?

text: To disable MFA once it's enabled, click the Disable Multi Factor Authentication button on the Company Profile screen.

text.text: What happens to users the next time they log in after MFA is enabled?

text: The next time your users log into ZOLL Online, they will be prompted to choose a MFA option. Once they choose, they will be required to use that option along with their password every time they log into ZOLL Online.

text.text: How do users set up their MFA option?

text: Users can set up their MFA option by going to ZOLL Online and choosing an additional authentication option to use along with their password.

text.text: What are the available MFA options for users?

text: The available MFA options for users are Okta Verify and Google Authenticator.

text.text: Can users choose multiple MFA options

text: Currently, users can only choose one MFA option.

text.text: What is Okta Verify and how does it work as an MFA option?

text: Okta Verify is a mobile app that generates one-time passcodes that users can use to authenticate themselves when they log in to ZOLL Online. To use Okta Verify, users will need to download the app to their mobile device and create an account. Once they have created an account, they will be able to generate one-time passcodes that they can use to log in to ZOLL Online.

text.text: How does Google Authenticator function as an MFA option

text: Google Authenticator is a mobile app that generates one-time passcodes that users can use to authenticate themselves when they log in to ZOLL Online. To use Google Authenticator, users will need to download the app to their mobile device and create an account. Once they have created an account, they will be able to generate one-time passcodes that they can use to log in to ZOLL Online.

text.text: What is the process for SMS Authentication as an MFA option?

text: SMS Authentication is not currently an available MFA option for users.

text.text: How does Email Authentication work as an MFA option?

text: Email Authentication is an MFA option that allows users to receive a one-time authentication code via email for each ZOLL Online log in attempt.

text.text: What should users do once their MFA option is configured?

text: Once users have configured their MFA option, they will be required to use that option along with their password every time they log into ZOLL Online.

text.text: How do users log in to ZOLL Online using MFA?

text:
To log in to ZOLL Online using MFA, users should:
1. Go to ZOLLOnline.com
2. Enter their username and password
3. Click Sign In
4. Follow the on-screen instructions and enter their one-time authentication code from their authenticator app, text message, or email
5. Click Verify

text.text: What should users do if they want to reset their MFA option in ZOLL Online?

text: To reset a user's MFA option, contact ZOLL Data Support.

text.text: What happens if a user enters an incorrect authentication code during login?

text: If a user enters an incorrect authentication code during login, they will be prompted to try again. If they continue to enter incorrect authentication codes, their account may be locked. If this happens, they will need to contact ZOLL Data Support to unlock their account.

text.text: Is there an option to skip the MFA authentication step for a certain duration?

text: Currently, there is no option to skip the MFA authentication step for a certain duration.

text.text: Can users switch to a different MFA option once they have chosen one?

text: Yes, users can switch to a different MFA option once they have chosen one. To do this, they will need to contact ZOLL Data Support.

text.text: How does the appearance of the login screen change with MFA enabled?

text: The appearance of the login screen does not change with MFA enabled.

text.text: Are there any exceptions to using MFA for logging into ZOLL Online?

text: There are no exceptions to using MFA for logging into ZOLL Online.

text.text: how do I turn on MFA?

text: You must be a Company Administrator to activate MFA. You can view user permissions by going to Admin > Billing > User Accounts and clicking your user name.

text.text: how can i enable MFA?

text: You must be a Company Administrator to activate MFA. You can view user permissions by going to Admin > Billing > User Accounts and clicking your user name.
